data.title: U.S. Under-18 Select Team Kicks off Hlinka Gretzky Cup with Czechia Matchup
data.meta_description: U.S. Under-18 Select Team Kicks off Hlinka Gretzky Cup with Czechia Matchup
data.text:
General | 8/5/2024 12:10:50 PM

For Immediate Release | August 5, 2024

USHL News | 2024 U.S. Under-18 Select Team

U.S. Under-18 Select Team Kicks off Hlinka Gretzky Cup with Czechia Matchup

The U.S. Under-18 Select Team will begin their quest for the gold today as they take on Czechia in the preliminary round of the Hlinka Gretzky Cup. The action kicks off at 5:30 p.m. ET from Rogers Place in Edmonton, Alberta and will be broadcast live on NHL Network.

Team USA's roster consists of 15 players who played in the USHL during the 2023-24 season, including All-USHL Rookie First Team selection Ben Kevan.

Two former USHL coaches will serve as assistant coaches: Nick Oliver (SF Assistant Coach 2015-2018, FGO Head Coach 2022-23) and Ben Gordon (TC Assistant Coach 2015-16, CHI Associate Head Coach 2017-18, DM Assistant Coach 2018-19) will bolster the staff.

USHL Ties on 2024 U.S. Under-18 Men’s Select Team (Listed team/teams they played for in 2023-24)

D- Edison Engle (DM, 2023-24)

D- Matthew Grimes (SF, 2023-24)

D- Cullen McCrate (DBQ, 2023-24)

D- Carter Murphy (YNG, 2023-24)

D- Jacob Rombach (LIN, 2023-24)

F- Chase Jette (NTDP, WAT, 2023-24)

F- Sam Kappell (MAD, 2023-24)

F- Ben Kevan (DM, 2023-24)

F- Matthew Lansing (WAT, 2023-24)

F- Mason Moe (MAD, 2023-24)

F- Teddy Mutryn (CHI, NTDP, 2023-24)

F- Jesse Orlowsky (WAT, 2023-24)

F- Cooper Simpson (TC, 2023-24)

F- Sam Spehar (MUS, 2023-24)

F- Nicolas Sykora (OMA, 2023-24)

Czechia, Finland, and Germany join the U.S. in Group B. Canada, Slovakia, Sweden, and Switzerland make up Group A. Since its beginning in 1991, the U.S. has finished in the top three of the Hlinka tournament 14 times.

All of Team USA’s games will be televised live on NHL Network.

Be sure to visit ushl.com for more information on the USHL.

The United States Hockey League and its member clubs are committed to being the world's leading amateur athlete development league. The USHL aspires to develop elite players, students, coaches, referees, hockey staff, and business personnel, helping them become the best players, professionals, and people they can be. The USHL is committed to being a leader in the hockey world and in the communities in which its member teams reside.
